alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 9:07PM CST until December 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Another Snow Event Expected Tuesday... .Snow will overtake most of the area Tuesday morning and last several hours before transitioning to a round of freezing drizzle later in the day. Several inches of snow are possible, especially in Wisconsin. Like Sunday night, roads are expected to quickly become snow covered on Tuesday causing less than perfect travel conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing drizzle expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to 1/10 of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa and 511mn.org in Minnesota.
